nodes.title: Google
nodes.short_description: Controls Android, Play Store, AdMob; policies and fees shape global app economy.

nodes.title: Android
nodes.short_description: Dominant mobile OS enabling app distribution, APIs, and policies across global markets.

nodes.title: Google Play
nodes.short_description: Primary Android app store; billing, review, and distribution rules drive developer monetization.

nodes.title: Digital Markets Act (EU)
nodes.short_description: EU law forcing gatekeepers to allow alternative app stores and billing; reshapes platform power.

nodes.title: General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)
nodes.short_description: EU privacy regulation restricting ad tracking and data sharing; mandates consent flows affecting monetization.

nodes.title: United States
nodes.short_description: Largest revenue market; antitrust actions and privacy laws influence app store and ad practices.

nodes.title: European Union
nodes.short_description: Major market imposing DMA and GDPR compliance, altering app distribution and monetization models.

nodes.title: China
nodes.short_description: Huge market with strict app filing, content, and data rules; favors local stores and super-apps.

nodes.title: India
nodes.short_description: Massive user base; UPI-driven payments and policy shifts shape pricing and app growth.

nodes.title: Telecommunications Business Act (South Korea)
nodes.short_description: Mandates alternative in-app billing, challenging app store payment monopolies.

nodes.title: Epic Games v. Google antitrust case
nodes.short_description: Jury finding of anti-competitive conduct pressures Play Store fees and distribution policies.

nodes.title: Meta Platforms
nodes.short_description: Facebook and Instagram advertising drive user acquisition and monetization for mobile apps globally.

nodes.title: ByteDance
nodes.short_description: TikTok platform and ads shape discovery, user acquisition costs, and monetization dynamics.

nodes.title: Tencent Holdings
nodes.short_description: WeChat ecosystem, payments, and app stores influence distribution and monetization in China.

nodes.title: Mobile Advertising
nodes.short_description: Core revenue engine for many apps; changes in tracking and attribution directly affect profitability.
